songs.title: Da’ Godfather
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Dr. Dre and Baby S]
Yeah, uh yeah, yeah, uh yeah
B-U-D, Baby S
About time, making that shit happen
Uh huh, yeah, yeah
They go a little something like this
Uh, check it out
Uh yeah, uh yeah

[Verse 1: Dr. Dre]
Yo, huh, we grew up for the whole enchilada
Make a dolla', take a dolla', street schola'
[?] skeletal cat laced in black
Could you be a line backer, blitz tight [?] assist, irresistible
[?] your baby mommas
But they just want to gobble my 'stache like a tank of piranhas

[Verse 2: Baby S]
[?] my pen might draw
[?] never saw such a real deal mat, a real deal pack
I run with, we done with
Intentions are varying all them process
You shook ass niggas, I used to love you, now I drop you
[?] and pop you, like corn my worst [?]
Your shit tore my slow ways and my form
Want to hate me, your ex-girl want to rape me
